message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at a price of $12,000. I believe it holds significant value and this offer reflects its worth.
Alice,  $12,000 is above my budget. I'm willing to pay $7,000 for the product. Let me know if you're interested.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I'm motivated to sell, $7,000 is significantly below its value. Could you meet me halfway at $9,500?
Alice,  I'm still not able to go that high. I can offer $8,500.  This is my final offer. Let me know if you're willing to accept.
